about_the_game:
Battle Plan: Jester's Knife is a tactical, tile sliding, strategy game featuring hand-drawn animated combat. Plan your character’s sequence of actions to get the upper hand on your opponent in a real-time shuffling mode or turn based. With 6 characters to choose from, all carefully hand-crafted and animated frame by frame.

Battle characters in an arcade mode or explore, solve puzzles and defeat bosses in the single player campaign. Uncover the Jester’s past, meet the rest of the cast and potentially save everyone from impending doom.

Battle Plan: Jester's Knife is scheduled to be released sometime in 2024.

Join our discord to talk about the game or give us any feedback;
https://discord.gg/ajU8vwpE
